alert.note: Alert for Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Lee; Coastal Sarasota; DeSoto; Highlands; Inland Charlotte; Inland Lee; Inland Sarasota (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 30 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Highlands, Charlotte, southern DeSoto, Lee and southeastern Sarasota Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 458 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong cluster of thunderstorms from west of Venus southwest to around Fort Myers and Captiva. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cape Coral, Fort Myers, North Port, Bonita Springs, Punta Gorda, Lehigh Acres, Port Charlotte, Palmona Park, Southwest Florida Airport, Harlem Heights, Babcock Webb Wma, Lochmoor Waterway Estates, Cypress Lake, McGregor, Babcock Ranch, Pine Manor, Matlacha Isles-Matlacha Shores, Olga, Venus and Pineland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Lee; Coastal Sarasota; DeSoto; Highlands; Inland Charlotte; Inland Lee; Inland Sarasota
